verbs.description: [ARG0: John Legend] [V: talked] [ARG2: to Angela Yee] [ARG1: about his stance on Kanye 's Trump endorsement] , [ARGM-CAU: especially in light of Ye posting the text messages from John about the MAGA madness] .
John Legend talked to Angela Yee about his stance on Kanye 's Trump endorsement , especially in light of [ARG0: Ye] [V: posting] [ARG1: the text messages from John about the MAGA madness] .
